haw_hamburg.database.implementations

Class DatabaseController

  • java.lang.Object
    • haw_hamburg.database.implementations.DatabaseController

  • public final class DatabaseController
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for initializing the database connection and accessing data of the database.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void cacheData()
      Loading data of the database in memory.

      static java.util.Collection<Student> getStudents()

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public static void init(java.util.Properties properties)
                 throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                        AlreadyInitializedException,
                        MissingPropertyException
        Initialize the database connection.
        Parameters:
        properties - connection information for the database.
        Required keys (for further information see hibernate doc):
        - hibernate.connection.username
        - hibernate.connection.password
        - hibernate.dialect
        - hibernate.connection.url
        - hibernate.connection.driver_class
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the parameter properties is null
        AlreadyInitializedException - if the DatabaseController is already initialized
        MissingPropertyException - if the parameter properties does not contain a value for the required keys (see above)

      • cacheData

        public static void cacheData()
                      throws org.hibernate.HibernateException,
                             NotInitializedException
        Loading data of the database in memory.
        The methods getCurrentUser(), getStudents() and getCourses() will no longer load the data of the database when
        they are called, after cacheData() is called the first time.
        You can refresh the cached data by calling cacheData() again.
        Throws:
        org.hibernate.HibernateException - the base throwable type for Hibernate
        NotInitializedException - if the DatabaseController is not initialized
        See Also:
        getCurrentUser(), getStudents(), getCourses(), init(Properties)

      • getCurrentUser

        public static Student getCurrentUser()
                              throws org.hibernate.HibernateException,
                                     NotInitializedException
        Returns:
        student data of the user that is logged in the system
        Throws:
        org.hibernate.HibernateException - the base throwable type for Hibernate
        NotInitializedException - if the DatabaseController is not initialized

      • getStudents

        public static java.util.Collection<Student> getStudents()
                                                 throws org.hibernate.HibernateException,
                                                        NotInitializedException
        Returns:
        all students in the database
        Throws:
        org.hibernate.HibernateException - the base throwable type for Hibernate
        NotInitializedException - if the DatabaseController is not initialized

        Throws:
